title: Less Laggy Client Please
body:
So my team was forced to remake because my game crashed while on the loading screen and it took the client over 3 minutes to reopen before I could press the reconnect button, where I would have had to wait another minute and a half to load back into the game.

I know I could solve the problem by scrubbing my hard drive clean of anything related to LoL and then reinstalling it, but I shouldn't have to be forced to do that after every patch to prevent these absurd load times.

replies.body:
Scrubbing your hard drive isn't going to help with this problem. I don't have an answer for you, just wanted to let you know that you don't have to go through that ceremony with each patch.

Flamingo Tango is a great username! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Do you know what's causing the client to constantly blur out?  The entire thing goes out of focus  until i interact with it in some way, then it goes blurry again.  Started happening two patches ago.  Really annoying.
I have this issue too, but even if I scrub my hard drive clean and reinstall after each patch it really doesn't do anything
